official_title: A bill to prohibit the landfill disposal of hazardous waste, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to prohibit the issuance of permits for the disposal of any hazardous waste on or into a landfill. Exempts from such prohibition landfill facilities for which a permit: (1) was issued before the date of enactment of this Act; or (2) is treated as having been issued under specified provisions for interim status permits.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the landfill disposal of hazardous waste, and for other purposes.
